name: Zodiac (itch) (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Robert Henderson - Anirog. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

You must travel through the corridors of time in search of the twelwe mystical Signs of the Zodiac scattered far and wide by the most powerful Master in the Black Arts.

There are nearly 23 possible locations and the signs are guarded by three types of demon; Jessor, Jukul and Jufo. They will attack without provocation. Any direct contact with either the demons or the corridor walls will result in instant annihilation. 

Alas, you cannot afford to stand still. When the 12 signs have been recovered you will be transported to the entrance of the Time Vaults. After you collect all 12 signs the demons will wake up and become faster. Collect all of the Zodiac signs 3 times and save humanity.

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: A  
Move: Cursor keys
Fire: A 

Start the game: Z
Move: Arrow keys
Fire: Z
